thread.title: Interracial couple fined for not removing graffiti slur | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Interracial couple fined for not removing graffiti slur | Daily Mail Online

author: Jordan Gass-Poore For Dailymail.Com
title: Interracial couple fined for not removing graffiti slur | Daily Mail Online
text: Interracial couple are FINED for refusing to remove racial slur graffiti from their garage until authorities probe the vandalism Heather Lindsay and Lexene Charles have been fined more than $3,600 They refuse to remove the N-word spray painted on their garage in Stamford The incident occurred during Martin Luther King Jr's birthday weekend Lindsay says she won't remove it until the authorities investigate harassment She says her home has been vandalized before, but nothing has been done The homeowner also claims neighbors have shouted racist abuse at her husband Published: 06:32 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 13:07 GMT, 21 February 2017 28 shares
